content.text: Precautions shall be taken in order to avoid contact with parts of power supply cables and associated  equipment. Information technology cables shall be lower than power supply cables.

The methods (components and construction techniques) employed to maintain the segregation requirements  shall take into account all relevant operating and environmental conditions (e.g. sun, rain, wind, ice etc.).
